verbs.description: If Trump scuttles the Iran deal , he [V: wo] n't just ignore the judgment of experts and our international allies . Even GOP lawmakers oppose the move .

[ARGM-ADV: If Trump scuttles the Iran deal] , [ARG0: he] [ARGM-MOD: wo] [ARGM-NEG: n't] [ARGM-ADV: just] [V: ignore] [ARG1: the judgment of experts and our international allies] . Even GOP lawmakers oppose the move .
If Trump scuttles the Iran deal , he wo n't just ignore the judgment of experts and our international allies . [ARG0: Even GOP lawmakers] [V: oppose] [ARG1: the move] .
